Title: Bharat Ane Nenu
Writer: Trivedi Meda (script coordinator), Srihari Nanu (original story), Koratala Siva
Actors: Mahesh Babu, Kiara Advani, Prakash Raj, Sarath Kumar
Plot: To make good on a promise he made to his mother, a university graduate returns to India and becomes disillusioned by the government corruption he encounters.
